entry.tran: 反情报行动;反间谍活动
entry.def: Counter-intelligence consists of actions that a country takes in order to find out whether another country is spying on it and to prevent it from doing so.

example.tran: 美国联邦调查局反间谍处

means.word_mean: 1. intelligence activities concerned with identifying and counteracting the threat to security posed by hostile intelligence organizations or by individuals engaged in espionage or sabotage or subversion or terrorism
